# Vest of Escape
## Overview
**Aura** faint conjuration and transmutation; **CL** 4th

**Slot** —

**Price** 5,200 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

Hidden within secret pockets of this simple silk vest are magic lockpicks that provide a +4 competence bonus on [[Disable Device (Skill)|Disable Device]] checks. The vest also grants its wearer a +6 competence bonus on [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]] checks.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Knock (Spell)|knock]], [[Grease (Spell)|grease]]*

**Cost** 2,600 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 532
